original_description: DescriptionAnalyzer is an advanced tool that analyzes product descriptions, extracting key features and generating a summary. It uses AI to understand context and relevance, ensuring the summary is accurate and concise.
test_results: {"tests": [{"input": "This is a high-end gaming laptop with a 15.6-inch display and an Intel Core i7 processor. It has 16GB RAM and a 1TB SSD. It features a powerful NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 graphics card.", "output": "High-end gaming laptop, 15.6-inch display, Intel Core i7, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 graphics card."}, {"input": "This is a compact digital camera with a 20.1 megapixel sensor. It has a 25x optical zoom and features built-in Wi-Fi for easy photo sharing.", "output": "Compact digital camera, 20.1 megapixel sensor, 25x optical zoom, built-in Wi-Fi."}]}
